projects.title: Learn vue
projects.description: Learn vue with firebase and tailwind. Make sure you learn the basics of vue and then move on to the more advanced topics.

projects.title: Learn french
projects.description: Enroll in french class. Also watch french movies and listen to french music. Use duolingo to learn french.

projects.title: Write letters
projects.description: Make sure you send to everyone and say sorry that you did not reply earlier.
